title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Mistranslation
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A language learning app enthusiast misreads a warning sign in Japanese, eats a deadly wild plant while foraging, and dies believing she's having an authentic cultural experience.

death_teaser: She thought she was fluent. She was fatally wrong.
